title: 23. Fairness
description:
MIT 6.S897 Machine Learning for Healthcare, Spring 2019
Instructor: Peter Szolovits
View the complete course: https://ocw.mit.edu/6-S897S19
YouTube Playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLUl4u3cNGP60B0PQXVQyGNdCyCTDU1Q5j

In this lecture, Prof. Szolovits talks about algorithmic fairness and fairness in the way we build machine learning models. He raises the question 'What do we mean by fairness in society?' and discusses how that affects prediction models.
